content: posted by ade november 13 2005 09 13 pm 1920s hat > you will need lion brand jiffy in the > color of your choice a crochet hook > i m a tight crocheter and used size > k so if your gauge is normal use j > and if it s loose use i a few feet > of 1/4 thick ribbon in the color of > your choice > > the whole hat is worked in the round > half_double_crochet = half_double_crochet double_crochet = double > crochet and single_crochet = single_crochet archived pattern url 1 archived hat photo 2 *previously available in lion brand yarn blog * 1 http //web archive org/web/20060827045209/http //www lionbrand com/archives/lbyarnblog3/2005/11/1920s_hat_patte html 2 http //web archive org/web/20060827081219/http //www lionbrand com/archives/lbyarnblog3/2005/11/fun_projects html
